title: HOUR 1 - NBA draft, Kyrie Irving, Manning
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - NBA draft, Kyrie Irving, Manning
description:
Joy Taylor in for Colin

 

Thoughts on the NBA draft last night

Kyrie Irving's list of teams he would like to play for

Arch Manning committing to play for the Texas Longhorns

 

Guest: Joel Klatt

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
